opinion.court: Supreme Court of the United States
opinion.case_name: Chrissy F., by Her Next Friend and Guardian Ad Litem, Medley v. Dale, Individually and as Chancellor for the Tenth Chancery Court District of Mississippi

opinion:
510 U.S. 1214

Chrissy F., by Her Next Friend and Guardian ad Litem, Medley
v.
Dale, Individually and as Chancellor for the Tenth Chancery Court District of Mississippi, et al.

No. 93-754.

Supreme Court of United States.

March 21, 1994.

1

Appeal from the C. A. 5th Cir.

2

Motions of Legal Services for Children and National Center for Protective Parents for leave to file briefs as amici curiae granted. Certiorari denied. Reported below: 995 F. 2d 595.
